data.lore: Elise's entrancing beauty and grace conceal the pitiless, black heart of a deadly predator. With ruthless cunning, she lures the unsuspecting with promises of favor from the spider god. Having exchanged her humanity to become something far more sinister, Elise sacrifices the innocent to maintain her power and seemingly eternal youth. No one can fathom how many have been caught in her web, slain to feed her insatiable hunger.
data.name: Elise
data.title: The Spider Queen

spells.tooltip: Deals Magic Damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus 8% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current Health. Max {{ e2 }} bonus damage to monsters.
spells.description:
Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Deals Magic Damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus 8% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's current Health. Max {{ e2 }} bonus damage to monsters.
spells.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite
spells.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is. Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

spells.tooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.
spells.description:
Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed and heal Elise on each attack.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing {{ e3 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.
spells.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy
spells.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed and heal Elise on each attack.

spells.tooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.
spells.description:
Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed.

Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Stuns the first enemy hit for {{ e5 }} seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.
spells.name: Cocoon / Rappel
spells.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.

spells.tooltip:
Elise transforms into a menacing spider, granting access to arachnid abilities.

Spider Form: Elise deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Magic Damage per attack and gains {{ e3 }} Movement Speed.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities. Max {{ e5 }} Spiderlings.
spells.description: Transforms into a menacing spider with new abilities. While in Spider Form, Elise deals bonus Magic Damage on attack and has increased Movement Speed.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, granting access to arachnid abilities. Spider Form: Elise deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Magic Damage per attack and gains {{ e3 }} Movement Speed. Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities. Max {{ e5 }} Spiderlings.
spells.name: Spider Form
spells.sanitizedDescription: Transforms into a menacing spider with new abilities. While in Spider Form, Elise deals bonus Magic Damage on attack and has increased Movement Speed.

spells.tooltip: Lunges to a target with a poisonous bite that deals Magic Damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus 8% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's missing Health. Max {{ e2 }} bonus damage to monsters.
spells.description:
Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.

Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Lunges to a target with a poisonous bite that deals Magic Damage equal to {{ e1 }} plus 8% (+{{ a1 }}%) of the target's missing Health. Max {{ e2 }} bonus damage to monsters.
spells.name: Venomous Bite / Neurotoxin
spells.sanitizedDescription: Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is. Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Spiderlings gain {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed.

Active: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for Elise and her Spiderlings for 3 seconds. While active, Elise is healed for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health when she or her Spiderlings attack.
spells.description: Elise and her Spiderlings gain a burst of Attack Speed and their attacks heal Elise.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Spiderlings gain {{ e5 }}% Attack Speed. Active: Increases Attack Speed by {{ e2 }}% for Elise and her Spiderlings for 3 seconds. While active, Elise is healed for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) Health when she or her Spiderlings attack.
spells.name: Skittering Frenzy / Volatile Spiderling
spells.sanitizedDescription: Elise and her Spiderlings gain a burst of Attack Speed and their attacks heal Elise.

spells.tooltip:
On Enemy Cast: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air and then descend upon the target enemy.

On Ground Cast: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. She can then cast Rappel again to descend upon a nearby enemy.
spells.description: Ascends into the air, briefly becoming untargetable, and then descends upon an enemy.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: On Enemy Cast: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air and then descend upon the target enemy. On Ground Cast: Elise and her Spiderlings lift up into the air, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. She can then cast Rappel again to descend upon a nearby enemy.
spells.name: Rappel / Cocoon
spells.sanitizedDescription: Ascends into the air, briefly becoming untargetable, and then descends upon an enemy.

spells.tooltip:
Transforms Elise into her Human Form, granting access to regular abilities.

Spider Form: Elise deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Magic Damage per attack and gains {{ e3 }} Movement Speed.

Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities. Max {{ e5 }} Spiderlings.
spells.description: Transforms into Human Form, removing Spider Form bonuses but granting the ability to generate new Spiderlings by casting spells.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Transforms Elise into her Human Form, granting access to regular abilities. Spider Form: Elise deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) bonus Magic Damage per attack and gains {{ e3 }} Movement Speed. Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage and take {{ e4 }}% reduced damage from multi-target abilities. Max {{ e5 }} Spiderlings.
spells.name: Human Form
spells.sanitizedDescription: Transforms into Human Form, removing Spider Form bonuses but granting the ability to generate new Spiderlings by casting spells.

passive.name: Spider Swarm
passive.description:
Human Form: When Elise's spells hit an enemy, she readies a Spiderling.

Spider Form: Elise summons her Spiderlings to attack nearby foes.
passive.sanitizedDescription: Human Form: When Elise's spells hit an enemy, she readies a Spiderling. Spider Form: Elise summons her Spiderlings to attack nearby foes.
